alert.note: Alert for San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern San Saba County through 630 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Saba, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Saba, Bend, Chappel and Us-190 Near The San Saba- Lampasas County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
